Based on your preference cues and the genres mentioned, I would recommend "District 9." It is a science fiction film directed by Peter Jackson, known for his films "The Lord of the Rings" trilogy and "The Hobbit" film.

The movie revolves around an extraterrestrial race that has been forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth. When this race comes across a government agent who has been exposed to their biotechnology, it leads to a conflict between these two races.

The movie explores various themes such as humanity, compassion, empathy, understanding, and acceptance.

"District 9" is an outstanding film that not only offers breathtaking visuals but also provides an insightful exploration of various themes. I highly recommend this exceptional film to anyone seeking a thrilling and thought-provoking cinematic experience.
